movies.title: Andorra. Entre el torb i la Gestapo
movies.plot: Subtitled ¨Entre el torb i la Gestapo¨ (between the Torb and the Gestapo). The story of the cooperation of the the French resistance, the people of Andorra and Catalunya in aiding the escape of the survivors of a RAF plane crash carrying essential information back to British Intelligence via Barcelona during the 2nd world war. The Torb is a fierce winter wind that blows through the mountain passes of Andorra between France and Spain. Based on true events.

biography.bio: David Bagés was born in 1966 in Reus, Tarragona, Catalonia, Spain as David Bagés Domínguez. He is an actor, known for La Riera (2010), Temps de silenci (2001) and Barcelona Christmas Night (2015).
biography.name: David Bagés

biography.bio: Joan Bentallé was born on August 23, 1963 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He is an actor and writer, known for Everlasting Love (2014), Tres días de libertad (1996) and Salvador (Puig Antich) (2006).
biography.name: Joan Bentallé

biography.bio: Alex Brendemühl was born on November 27, 1972 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Alex Brendemühl Gubern. He is an actor and writer, known for The German Doctor (2013), Mal de pierres (2016) and The Hours of the Day (2003).
biography.name: Alex Brendemühl

biography.bio: Isabelle Brès is an actress, known for Jean-François i el sentit de la vida (2018), Ventdelplà (2005) and La grande soirée anti-arnaque (2005). She has been married to Jean-Philippe since December 2007. They have one child.
biography.name: Isabelle Brès
